website_summaries.verdict: Superior quality and craftsmanship make this a top choice in corner shelf units.
pros: Owners praise the high quality and excellent construction of his well-made corner shelf unit
It stands out for its impressive and stylish appearance, as well as its durability and longevity
Users report it stands up well over time
cons: Significantly more expensive than corner shelves made of other materials
Requires special care such as the use of teak oil to keep it in optimum condition

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shower shelf
customer_reviews.text: Extremely solid shelf, gorgeous wood. Only thing I'll say is that it's big, but they give the dimensions. Make sure you measure! There are a bunch of others on Amazon too but they all had fixed feet. if your shower was made properly unless you have one of those nifty euro perimeter drain showers, it's going to have some pitch to it and without adjustment your shelf is going to rock more than a sailing ship in a maelstrom. Ours leveled out easily and holds our various shower stuffs well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece! I took the advice of other reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece! I took the advice of other reviews and bought teak oil to stain the piece first. It looks wonderful! It's in the corner of my shower, under the shower head, so it doesn't have direct water all the time. It holds so much! We were able to place all our shampoo and soap/etc on the shelf with plenty room to spare. The leveling legs are perfect for a shower stall that may have sloping sides. Very sturdy. We are planning to purchase another piece, a smaller piece, for towel storage in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mom-of-multiples

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Easy to put together. I use it in the shower. No issue so far
customer_reviews.author: Siri Napan

customer_reviews.title: Well made and stylish
customer_reviews.text: We bought a new home and the master bathroom has a very big shower but no built in shelving to hold shampoo/soap/etc. We bought this as as solution and it has worked out really well. It is study and stores plenty of shower stuff (multiple shampoos, soaps, shaving stuff). Getting level was a breeze because all the legs are adjustable. It looks very nice and I would definitely recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and very attractive
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this along with teak oil. It was larger than I expected but that was a plus. Very sturdy and beautiful wood with a great color. The adjustable foot works perfectly. I applied the teak oil and though it was sticky at first, it formed a strong shell that water beads on. Plenty of room on each shelf for several items. I liked it so much I also bought the Aqua Teak corner benches as well and they look great together!
customer_reviews.author: Mike W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually leave reviews because honestly, I think it's a waste of my time. I think that this product is so beyond what I had expected that I had leave some feedback. This is our second aqua teak product (first being the corner bench) that we purchased after being so pleased with the first one. It is very thick wood and had sturdy hardware. The adjustable feet are absolutely necessary and I'm glad that they thought to use them. The product looks great, smells great, and seems very high quality. I would definitely recommend and will probably be buying more aqua teak products in the future. PS i am not being paid by aqua teak! ;)

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for showers
customer_reviews.text: After a few months the wood stain began to wash off and stain the grout. We also noticed mold developing under shampoo and conditioner bottles. I wanted to love these but ended up hating them. They're made well and are beautiful, but I would not recommend these to be placed in showers.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful solid teak
customer_reviews.text: Love the corner shelf and teak bench I ordered for our shower. They look so nice against the grey tile. Needed to get one longer bolt on the shelf but otherwise it went together easily. I contacted the company and they sent out a longer bolt the same day. The bench and shelf arrived quickly. I’m very pleased with Aqua Teak.
customer_reviews.author: LindaB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the inside of the shower
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful, very modern style wood shelf, very classy. It has the sleekness of minimalist Scandinavian furniture which is perfect. It would be right at home in a very expensive sauna. It is very sturdy and fits very nicely in the corner without wobbling. I love the color of the teak. It is just made for the inside of the shower. I didn't need to adjust the legs at all and it makes my bath feel like a wonderful spa!
customer_reviews.author: Lorindae Lorrani

customer_reviews.title: Well made beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our master bathroom shower. It is substantial in size so it can store many items, and is very sturdily built. Easy to assemble, looks great and feels like a solid and quality piece of furniture. I treated it with a little teak oil before putting it in the shower to help maintain the beautiful color. I like it so much that I may purchase the shower stool as well.
customer_reviews.author: BakeSail

customer_reviews.title: Not stabile enough for shower use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to put in my shower for shaving my legs. It didn't work for that because it's too light weight, couldn't get it level or stabile in the shower. The black rubber feet left marks on the floor of the shower that I have not been able to scrub off. I keep moving the shelf around the house and have not found the right spot for it yet. Maybe on a covered porch and place some small plants on it. I'll keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Bath Shelf
customer_reviews.text: This is a strong, attractive piece of furniture. Instead of using it in my bathroom, I have it in my dining room. I needed something which would fit into a corner so I could brighten it up a bit. And it did the trick. Three shelves - I have a plant on the top, a photograph on the middle shelf and a decorative box on the bottom shelf.
customer_reviews.author: louie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit and finish, high quality, beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This corner piece is one of three items we purchased from AquaTeak to put into our newly remodel master bath. All three are finely crafted, substantial and beautiful additions. All three pieces arrived without a week. Some assembly is required for this corner piece with the six screws and wrench provided. It was assembled in ten minutes without a problem. The legs have a rubber foot that can be adjusted to make it sit perfectly flat. We love it and highly recommended the entire AquaTeak line of products.
customer_reviews.author: Walker, Reviewer and Artist

customer_reviews.title: Well Built - Sturdy - Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Very well built, Sturdy solid piece of furniture and looks great Easy to put together with well thought out design looks like high end furniture. Good seams. I like the leg adjusters on the bottom which make it easy to get it level on a slanted shower floor. Has a varnish to it...not the raw teak. Water repels and does not soak in.
customer_reviews.author: Concierge2000@710

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice solid teak wood corner shower stand. I put it together myself with one of those included allen wrenches. It took me about 15 minutes to put it together. It fits nicely in the shower and has a classy look to it, matching my solid teak stood I got at a store a couple of years ago. I'm surprised at how much stuff fits on all 3 shelves. The picture doesn't do it justice and it really organizes the shower to where it's all you need for all the stuff you may have in your shower. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Main

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf! bought it and the smaller foot stool for my shower and they fit perfectly! The feet are adjustable so its very sturdy. No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: mischam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect plant stand
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a shower, but when I put it together it looked too nice in the living room. This is the 3rd item I have bought from AquaTeak and they are all well made.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: smells bad after a  couple weeks or so in shower
customer_reviews.text: Is not sealed properly and smelled like urine or grandmas house? I can't put my finger on it... we got another teak stool at the same time and it is coated with a wax and does not smell. It isn't that old and smelled with in weeks. I hate this piece!
customer_reviews.author: jeeplady708

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shelves! Simple. Elegant. Functional. I especially like how tall they are and how much storage you get in a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Mad readers

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy corner stand. Finish of wood is pretty & smooth. Good amount of space between shelves for plants or whatever you want to put.
customer_reviews.author: 4Real

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful teakwood.
customer_reviews.text: This beautiful solid teakwood shower corner caddy was received in prefect condition. The box protected the wood with no excess plastic or styrofoam peanuts. The design is simply beautiful and very functional. A superior product from a FIVE STAR company!
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The highly adjustable legs are my favorite! Yes, it's beautiful, but if it weren't so sturdy, I wouldn't be such a fan. I can shave my legs with full confidence. It doesn't budge. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves this as a shower caddy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a rusted freestanding chrome caddy. It was easy to setup and in general functions much better. My wife likes it because it has more room and she can use the bottom shelf as a foot rest for shaving. It does stink like Teak, badly. After several weeks of getting it completely wet in the shower it's finally starting to stink less. It is large when it's in the actual shower but not uncomfortably so. It's definitely sturdy and all 4 feet have levelers.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in my shower
customer_reviews.text: I’m using it in the corner of my walk-in shower. It looks great, holds a ton, and is very sturdy. The leveling feet are great too and helped on the uneven tile.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well-bulit ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful teak corner shelf unit. Very sturdy with solid construction. I have it in my bathroom, but I think it could be used in any room of the house. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Real furniture
customer_reviews.text: This piece actually is solid, heavy, and beautiful. Well prepared for wet conditions and simple to assemble. Came well packaged. All four legs are adjustable for any surface height. Can be re treated in the future as it is not lacquered but oiled as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I only gave the product one star because I sent it back. It was way too big for what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product
customer_reviews.text: Quality Product! I have been using for a few months now in my shower. It now looks like a spa and there are no water marks and looks like the day I put it in the shower. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila I Butler

customer_reviews.title: Good looking stand
customer_reviews.text: Using this as a towel holder in my son’s bathroom. It looks great and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and functional
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shelves that are easy to assemble and adjust to the slanted shower floor.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Teaky Clean!
customer_reviews.text: Been using for several months now and the shelf is holding up well. While it is not directly in the shower, it still is splattered with water and looks great. Nice to keep shower items close at hand and easy to access. I don't put anything metal that could rust on it as I don't want rust stains to spoil how nice it looks. Very easy to assemble, took about 15 minutes total. Has leveling feet to keep shelf level if you have a beveled shower floor.
customer_reviews.author: James Kiracofe

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! It’s taller than I expected which is perfect for me! It’s beautifully crafted, great quality, and super easy to assemble. Get rid of your ugly hanging wire bath caddy and get yourself this teak bath shelf!
customer_reviews.author: KOehler

customer_reviews.title: Better than anticipated.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality. Beautifully constructed. The leveling leg is perfect for accommodating a slanting shower floor.I will be buying more from this quality vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Newton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for walk in shower
customer_reviews.text: Love this shower tower, it is the perfect size for our walk in shower. It holds all our products while looking very lux. The feet are adjustable, making it very stable on tile
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended from someone who’s picky
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular! Easy to assemble and exudes quality. Forget about those metal contraptions, they will rust and look nasty.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M.

customer_reviews.title: good service company1
customer_reviews.text: This fits our needs perfectly. We had a system o the shower wall, which kept falling so we were tired of repairing it. This will provide similar storage for shampoos, etc.
customer_reviews.author: EJB

customer_reviews.title: Function and beauty
customer_reviews.text: Fits great looks great and the adjustable legs keeps it level
customer_reviews.author: Konacoffeegal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to put together and has so far been very durable since I put it together 3 months ago. It is in the toilet closet, so does not get very wet, but I put a coat of teak oil on it anyway before I placed in the bathroom. Really enhanced the color.
customer_reviews.author: Humored by Everything

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I needed storage space in my large shower and this fit the bill! I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Ericksen

customer_reviews.title: Teak Bath Shelf Excels in Shower
customer_reviews.text: The teak shelf was very easy to put together and was very sturdy when completed. The adjustable legs worked perfectly on our sloped shower floor.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, well made
customer_reviews.text: Investigated several teak shelving units and decided this one had all the features that we needed. The ability to balance it on unlevel shower floors was one of the features that made us choose this one. Very happy with it and it looks great in our shower.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this it works perfectly in the corner of a walk on shower.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: The whole time I was putting this together I was commenting on the amazing quality of this product. Really impressive. The rubber feet and so a great job keeping the shelf level and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nofziger

customer_reviews.title: I Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: "WOW. This is seriously amazing. Very easy to put together and it is exceptionally sturdy. It is exactly what I was looking for. LOVE IT!!"
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Gregory

customer_reviews.title: A brand name that stands for it's quality Aqua Teak. Simply a fine product range.
customer_reviews.text: Aqua Teak products are very well made and assembly is very easy. The teak Aqua Teak uses, is of very high quality, well finished and smells for months after arrival the pure smell of teak wood. I am not only with this item but with all Aqua Teak product happy and I do have items for over 2 years and absolutely 100 procent satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Myron Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, solid piece of teak!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, solid piece of a teak furniture. Does take up a bit of space in our shower, but the size is perfect to hold all our stuff.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyT

customer_reviews.title: Totally great. I can't believe the price is so good
customer_reviews.text: It's gorgeous. Totally great. I can't believe the price is so good. Excellent customer service (I had a minor issue with one of the screws, and customer service immediately addressed and fixed the issue).
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lady Elise

customer_reviews.title: Love this bath shelf
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shower shelf. It’s made very well and sturdy unlike the first one I purchased and returned to Signature Hardware. Aqua teak bath shelf comes with adjustable feet which are much needed in a shower that slopes even the tiniest bit. Yes you have to assemble but takes no time at all. We are very happy with our Aqua teak bath shelf. Hint: Though not required, I coated shelf with teak oil which actually brings out the beautiful wood even more.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Blanks

customer_reviews.title: Great product and service
customer_reviews.text: Product is very high quality, but was cracked slightly upon installation due to the handmade nature of the pieces not fitting into each other perfectly, like a machined piece, but the customer service to make it right was on point. Great job handling customer issues!
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well built
customer_reviews.text: This is a great teak table. Put one in my shower and liked it so much, bought a second one for the corner in a second bathroom. Looks great, compact size, well built, easy to put together and love the leveling feet
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shower shelf!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Well built teak shelf for the shower. It’s y’all and holds a lot of bottles even the big ones. It has balancing pegs in the bottom of each leg so you can stabilize it really well.
customer_reviews.author: CharmaineG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, it’s worth the splurge.
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality piece that looks beautiful and provides us with the room we need for all our shower essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Afit

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Stable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the corner of our newly renovated shower. The adjustable legs were one reason we chose this item as that is a must for a shower with slanting floor. It is beautiful quality and assembles in minutes. Would buy the brand again.
customer_reviews.author: kim strauss

customer_reviews.title: Teak -  three shelf corner shower stand
customer_reviews.text: It, the teak stand, is serving the purpose it was purchased for. Namely, a roomy space for my wife's "stuff."
customer_reviews.author: Kirk A. Faupel

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well made. Nicely finished and easy to assemble. Should last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece! Sturdy, easy to put together. Have mine in my walk in shower. Holding up well. Room for a lot of things.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed, easy to assemble. Adjustable center front leg assures positive stabilization in a sloping shower
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Arena

customer_reviews.title: Top
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, seems well made, sturdy as hell. Make sure you seal it
customer_reviews.author: lectricTapeworm

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, looks great, and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and top-notch construction. Assembly was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: sbosak

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: It is expensive but is holding up in our shower well. It is been a few months and still looks great. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together. It has been in our shower for over a month. No discoloration. Very durable and looks great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost Too Beautiful for a Shower
customer_reviews.text: Love this lovely, substantial piece. Works perfectly in my shower to hold shampoo bottles. Beautiful and well made.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This makes your shower look like it belongs in a magazine.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy and beautiful corner unit. I wasn't sure if it would work for our family because we needed something that could hold our tall bottles of shampoo and this unit has plenty of room. It's a very nice piece and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: R. Tas

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: My wife really like this. It's very well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful teak shower shelf
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf! It was exactly what I was looking for. It wad fully assembled. I use mine in the shower and it's the perfect height and holds everything!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Dimakarakos

customer_reviews.title: After review of the opinions of many happy purchasers, I decided to give them a try ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a large walk-in shower which was in need of a bath shelf and bench. After review of the opinions of many happy purchasers, I decided to give them a try and let me tell you how happy I am. The construction and installation are top notch!
customer_reviews.author: richard deihl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and so well made!
customer_reviews.text: This was beyond my expectations in terms of quality, sturdiness and beauty. The levelers on the legs did the trick for my uneven shower floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great piece
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect piece for me !!! It looks like advertised, it was easy to build. The adjustable legs work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: High quality. The screws are hidden. It’s exactly what I was holding out for.
customer_reviews.author: Miss West

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected, love how sturdy it is and how much room for stuff I now have!
customer_reviews.author: tammy tassitano

customer_reviews.title: exactly what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: it was so easy to put together - took me five minutes. I put it in the corner of my shower and put plants on it. It's perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Annalyse Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality control. One bolt not properly cut—no extras. I had to go to the hardware store to find a proper part.
customer_reviews.author: RIOKC1

customer_reviews.title: This shelf is absolutely beautiful. It had color-coded stickers on it which made ...
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is absolutely beautiful. It had color-coded stickers on it which made it easier for me to put it together. It is not wobbly. It is sturdy. We have it in the corner of our shower and it's just gorgeous! Would buy 50 of them if I had 50 showers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed, sturdy piece
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully designed, sturdy piece. Shelves are at just the right height (No more bending down to reach my shampoo bottle!) and the depth is adequate. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Mili Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality! Just what I was looking for and would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Chic and functional
customer_reviews.text: I really love this teak wood shower caddy. I searched many different sites and stores for the perfect teak wood caddy and this turned out to be the best. The product is super easy to assemble and is sturdy and heavy, but not too heavy. You can tell it’s high quality. It fit perfectly in our shower.
customer_reviews.author: BellaMora

customer_reviews.title: The items looked as good in person as they did in the photos
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality, ease of assembling and thought the price was very fair. I’m glad I checked Amazon before ordering some teak from a catalog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More beautiful than pictured
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful. Arrived packaged well. East to assemble. Everyone that goes into the bathroom comments on how nice it is.
customer_reviews.author: Rockin Robin

customer_reviews.title: Craftsmanship is beautiful and it was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: So far no complaints...there are metal parts for assembly, so I'll be interested in seeing how long they hold out in a shower. Craftsmanship is beautiful and it was easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: John Mota

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color when oiled.
customer_reviews.text: Used teak oil on this piece before placing it in the shower. It looks beautiful. It is small enough to be out of the way but large enough to hold all necessary items. It's only been a week or so but very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is gorgeous and great quality. It was easy to put together and looks great in the corner of my shower. Now I don't have to bend over to pick up my shampoo off the floor of the shower. I love this shelf!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, solid rack.
customer_reviews.text: Simple to put together, required almost no leveling in our shower. Looks great. Hopeful that it will stand the test of time inside the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel B

customer_reviews.title: Buy it already
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to assemble. Just having this majestic shelf in my bathroom has increased the value of my home by millions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: Shipment was on time, very sturdy and well made. I put it together myself in 5 minutes looks great in the shower and no smell at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole George

customer_reviews.title: Its as beautiful as it is useful!
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable leveling legs really help. We have it in the shower and its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: v ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The stand is made of quality materials with outstanding workmanship. Very easy to assemble. I'm overall very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great corner shelf unit for the shower
customer_reviews.text: Great corner shelf unit for the shower. The adjustable feet allow it to be leveled and fit snug in the corner.
customer_reviews.author: D-Rock

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable feet for stability
customer_reviews.text: Well made for the price. Using as a corner shelf in a small bathroom, adds color and function
customer_reviews.author: Teach

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Love the height of the team stand and it fits perfectly in my shower. Easy to assemble and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it in my bathroom! I just sealed it so it will last better as I use it in my shower. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Julie K Segura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, very sturdy and looks great. Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: L.Oz

customer_reviews.title: we keep it in the shower and it looks and works great.
customer_reviews.text: well built, we keep it in the shower and it looks and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Nader Rabie

customer_reviews.title: Great Teak corner shelf for the shower!
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made, easy to assemble. So far doing great in my shower corner. Did seal it with steak oil to protect it as it gets wet.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia "Bellasmom"

customer_reviews.title: A solid shelf.
customer_reviews.text: This shelving unit is super solid, and has been a great addition to our shower. It looks great, and has held up really well to a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Reifschneider

customer_reviews.title: but it didn't have any coating applied to it like some of the other brands
customer_reviews.text: It's well-constructed, but it didn't have any coating applied to it like some of the other brands, so it's already fading. The teak shower bench I have from another company had an additional coating on it, and it still looks brand new after a year.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Chan

customer_reviews.title: Superior quality, fit and finish.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and finish! Adjustable levelling feet work well. Expensive but well worth it in terms of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Km

customer_reviews.title: Great product and performs well.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and functional. Love the slots and holes for razors, etc. Comes completelly assembled. Feet adjust to the floor, so the unit is level. Nice piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.author: David Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and looks great in our shower with 3 glass walls. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is both beautiful and functional it fits perfectly in my corner and so far is holding it's finish. It was very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made - sturdy shelf unit complete with rubber levelers perfect for slopped shower floor
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Ellis

product_meta.title: AquaTeak The Original Kai Corner Teak Bath Shelf
product_meta.description: Dimensions: 12" x 12' x 40.25" Height between shelves: 16" Weight: 11 lbs You will love the elegance and convenience of this OptiAREA space saving teak shower shelf! Naturally water resistant, you can use it for display or storage either indoors or outdoors. The teak bath shelf comes with all stainless steel hardware, and is built with stability and durability in mind. This beautiful AquaTeak shower stand is made with farm grown wood that has no direct impact on the natural environment. (Some assembly required)
feature_bullets: All Stainless Steel Non-Corroding Hardware & Adjustable Rubber Gripping Feet for Added Stability
Superior Design -- AquaTeak Has Been Featured in Architectural Digest Magazine.
Naturally Water Resistant & Durable (Indoor or Outdoor Use)
Five Year Warranty & 30 Day Satisfaction Guarantee!
